lines.text: And technology is made of wires...
And you can do a lot with technology...
What nonsense are you about to make come outta your mouth?
They used wires to build a miniature wormhole generator!
With, like, electricity, and science, they put together a device that would warp space!
And using that, they could open up a hole in his chest without damaging it!
Nope. Nosirree. Not havin' any of that.
Knox's fourth commandment for mysteries: no complicated devices that need a long explanation.
And Knox's second, all supernatural agencies are ruled out! We're clearly not playing by those rules!
Kid, this ain't sci-fi. This is a good old fashioned fantasy police procedural, and we're keepin' it that way.
If only there were... some sort of <c=#FF00FF>magic way to create a hole</c> involved...
